UAwRgrATA7BQ.name: Aaron's Will
implicits: (3% to 6%) of Maximum Health gained as Endurance Threshold
modifiers: (3% to 6%) of Maximum Health gained as Endurance Threshold
+1 Maximum Bone Golems per 4 maximum SkeletonsThis effect rounds down, for example if you have 7 max skeletons you will gain +1 maximum Bone Golem
You cannot summon skeleton warriors, archers or roguesOther skeletal minions can still be summoned
Bone Golems have a 6% chance on hit to grant you (2 to 4)% of their missing health as ward (1 second global cooldown)
Bone Shatter now has a 3 Second Cooldown
UAwRgrATA7BQ.lore: "Guilty as charged, I was being daft, but raising bones is my craft." - C.N.B

UAzBMGZgDiA.name: Abacus Rod
modifiers: Runebolt's element always matches the last skill you used directly that had a single elemental tagElemental tags are Fire, Cold, and Lightning.
Runebolts that have a different element to the last Runebolt you cast grant you a stack of Numeromancy (up to 5) and refresh the duration of existing stacksNumeromancy stacks last 5 seconds
+5 Spell Damage per stack of Numeromancy
5% increased Cast Speed per stack of Numeromancy
UAzBMGZgDiA.lore: "Runes provide order to magic, a way to shape it, harness it, and use it for one's will. Follow their structure and you shall remain in control, break it and you shall loose the madness between the lines." - Arch Runemaster Unvar to the college of Kolheim.

UAzCsCZgTiA.name: Aberrant Call
modifiers: +(1 to 3) to Level of Summon Wraith
Minions lose 6% of their current health per second
UAzCsCZgTiA.lore: A beacon among the eternity of the damned. A call to return to the world of the living, if only for a moment.

UAzAcGYFZKA.name: Aberroth's Command
modifiers: Void Cleave is now instant and is no longer a movement skill
Void Cleave no longer has a weapon requirement
Ravaging Auras created by Void Cleave lasts an additional (6 to 12) seconds and have +40% Void Penetration
(20% to 25%) Increased Area for Area Skills
UAzAcGYFZKA.lore: "Be the instrument of ruin, that which delivers time's atrophy, and fate's damnation."

UAzAcEYBZKA.name: Acidfletch
implicits: +(35% to 70%) Chance to apply Poison on Bow Hit
modifiers: +(35% to 70%) Chance to apply Poison on Bow Hit
100% of Hail of Arrows Damage converted to Poison
(30% to 60%) increased Hail of Arrows Duration
+(80% to 130%) Chance to apply Shred Armor on Bow Hit
UAzAcEYBZKA.lore: From the Radiant Dunes to the Sea of Glass, order corrodes throughout Eterra.

UAzBMoTgNiA.name: Advent of the Erased
modifiers: (5% to 11%) chance to gain Haste for 3 seconds when a nearby enemy diesHaste is a buff that grants 30% increased movement speed. Haste does not stack.
(35% to 15%) less Damage over Time taken while you have HasteMultiplicative with other modifiers

When you gain Haste or refresh its duration you gain (30 to 60) Ward (1 second cooldown) and your Minions gain Haste and Frenzy for 3 SecondsFrenzy is a buff that grants 20% Increased attack and cast speed. It cannot stack.
UAzBMoTgNiA.lore: "Those long lost may walk again on woven feet" - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

UAwRlDYE4g.name: Aergon's Refuge
implicits: (-3 to -5) Mana Cost for Spell Skills
modifiers: (-3 to -5) Mana Cost for Spell Skills
(10% to 20%) of Current Mana gained as Ward when you cast a Fire Spell
+(1 to 2) to Level of Flame Ward
+(100 to 750) Ward gained when you cast Flame Ward
10% less Damage Taken if you have at least 1000 WardMultiplicative with other modifiers
UAwRlDYE4g.lore: "Hold fast, maintain the runes! The flames of Rahyeh may envelope this tower, but they shall not penetrate these walls. There is knowledge here that must not burn."

UAzCMwZgDiA.name: Alchemist's Ladle
modifiers: (20 to 45)% chance to ignite, chill, shock, bleed, slow, poison, and blind on melee hit
UAzCMwZgDiA.lore: Infused with countless potions, its effects are unpredictable.

UAzDsEYCZKA.name: Alluvion
modifiers: 100% Chance to cast Tidal Wave when you use a Melee Attack (2 second cooldown)Tidal Wave deals cold damage to all enemies hit in a line in front of you.

UAwRgTAzMxA.name: Ambitions of an Erased Acolyte
implicits: (9 to 29) Ward Gained on Potion Use
modifiers: (9 to 29) Ward Gained on Potion Use
When a nearby enemy or ally dies you gain Ward equal to 2% to (4 to 6)% of its maximum health, up to 3,000 ward (2 second cooldown)
UAwRgTAzMxA.lore: "The context of thy aspirations is long lost, yet they still pervade thy silken form." - The Acolyte of Golden Silk

UAwVgbAjCBMQ.name: Anchor of Oblivion
modifiers: When a hit leaves you below your endurance threshold you are slowed and release a powerful Wave of Void (2 second cooldown)
UAwVgbAjCBMQ.lore: Hope pulls you forward, but the anchor ever stays your feet, as is the fate of mortals.

UAzAcEYHYE4g.name: Apathy's Maw
modifiers: +100% Chance to apply Doom on Hit
UAzAcEYHYE4g.lore: Forsake the darkening sky and let the ground swallow your mind.

UAwJgzGCMBsQ.name: Apex of Thought

modifiers: (30% to 77%) of Mana Spent Gained as Ward

While standing on your Glyph of Dominion, 100% of your Ignite Chance is converted to Fire Resistance Shred Chance, 100% of your Chill Chance is converted to Cold Resistance Shred Chance, and 100% of your Shock Chance is converted to Lightning Resistance Shred Chance.

UAzDsCZ1I.lore: When Ferebor's collection of totems grew too large, he gathered his creations in a cave while his fellow nomads moved on without him. As the winters passed and his collection grew, other nomads would visit him to trade food and furs for totems crafted to defend their tribes.

UAzAcCZ1I.name: Ferebor's Persistence
UAzAcCZ1I.lore: Fifty winters since they first parted, Ferebor's tribe returned to his cave eager to purchase another totem. However, instead of finding the storied totem carver, they were driven away by his creations. Assuming him dead, they paid their respects and moved on, yet the number of totems around the cave continued to grow. Some say Ferebor still dwells there, cut off from the outside but carving totem after totem among the shadows.

Casting a lightning spell grants Lightning Infusion, with a 20 second cooldownLightning Infusion gains a stack every second. UAzCMCZgFiA.lore: After making peace with the nagasa, Lord Berant of Skalnir was impatient to secure his legacy and so turned his eyes to an easier conquest. The Verdant Isle was small and his scouts assured him that its druid inhabitants had no weapons. But when his soldiers returned from the sacred island, they brought back only their thorn pierced fallen and tales of vine strangled ships.

implicits: (-3 to -4) Mana Cost for Spell Skills

Meteor is Converted to LightningConverts meteor's base damage, causing it to no longer scale with fire damage and causing Meteor to count as a lightning spell. Does not affect Shrapnel.
UAzDsEYA4DYg.lore: In her old age, Vilatria's hubris only grew. Having defeated all her human challengers, the storm queen's mind turned to Lagon, the fabled god of the sea and storms. With her apprentice, she sailed out from the border town of Etendell, along the estuary and out into the Fogrise sea. Lagon was said to dwell beneath the far seas beyond the western isles, yet the journey was quick for Vilatria as she fuelled her sails with winds of magic. Eventually she alighted at night upon a great isle of rock, coral, and ancient shrines. The moon spoke to her from its reflection flickering on the surface of the sea. It spoke with the voice of Lagon, and it spoke with amusement at her challenge, readily accepting, and opening the heavens. Thousands of years have passed and Vilatria is long dead, and her kingdom fractured, but the storms still rage upon the seas around that isle.

UAwVg7AjAHCQ.name: Vilatria's Storm Crown
modifiers: +1 to Level of Lightning Spell Skills
UAwVg7AjAHCQ.lore: Studying at the great colleges of Welryn and Vul'Kaur, Vilatria perfected the art of Storm Magic. Yet a scholarly life never sated her ambition and she returned to the Lake kingdoms of central Eterra. Without a god to lead them, their lords and elders were proud and open to challenges of force. With the college of Welryn on their doorsteps, they were not unprepared for arcane challengers, but their wards could not protect them from the lightning that tore threw the roofs of their halls and smote them in their thrones, and so Vilatria claimed their kingdoms by force.

+2 to Level of Cold Melee Skills
UAzBsEYFYGYg.lore: Falter not before the fire nor the ice, but let your ambition be your wings and soar above them both.

UAzAsoZgNiA.name: Wings of Discord
modifiers: (32% to 16%) less Damage Taken from the First Hit Received from each enemyMultiplicative with other modifiers

100% increased effect of stats on your Non-Unique Idols that are a different shape to all other equipped Non-Unique IdolsFor example if you have a 4x1 idol, a 3x1 idol, and two 1x3 idols equipped, the stats on the 4x1 idol and the 3x1 idol would have 100% increased effect, but the stats on the 1x3 idols would not be changed. Ignores idols of the Unique rarity.
+(256 to 512) Dodge Rating if you have been hit recentlyRecently refers to the past 4 seconds
+(32 to 64) Ward gained when you Dodge
UAzAsoZgNiA.lore: Osprix elders used to tell of the Quetzal Dragons, resplendant with wings of mismatched feathers, who were never seen to roost in the same place twice. The elders speculated that having visited every peak and forest in Eterra, they traveled far over the sea in search of new lands.

UAwRmGYDYFYg.name: World Splitter
implicits: +(130% to 190%) Chance to apply Bleed on Melee Hit
modifiers: +(130% to 190%) Chance to apply Bleed on Melee Hit
+2% increased Area for Melee Area Skills per 1 Mana Cost
+(0.2% to 0.3%) Critical Strike Chance for Melee Attacks per 1 Mana Cost
+1% Melee Critical Strike multiplier per 10 Max Mana
UAwRmGYDYFYg.lore: Sever the chains that bind reality

UAzBsEZKA.name: Woven Flesh
modifiers: (2% to 4%) of Overkill Damage Leeched as Health
(20% to 40%) increased Damage Leeched as Health
UAzBsEZKA.lore: The pinnacle of necromancy is to weave undead flesh into any form you desire.

UAwNgLAzBCsQ.name: Wraithlord's Harbour
implicits: (13% to 23%) Minion Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
modifiers: (13% to 23%) Minion Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
Casting Summon Wraith instead summons a Wraithlord

The Wraithlord scales with your Summon Wraith Tree and summons other Wraiths for you while in combatThese Wraiths still count as yours, not the Wraithlord's, and scale with your Summon Wraith tree, not the Wraithlord's Summon Wraith tree.

While at max wraiths, the Wraithlord casts Necrotic Beams and regularly consumes your non-wraith minions to empower itself, gaining Temporary Maximum Health equal to 10% of their maximum health and +3 spell damage for 10 secondsThe Wraithlord can consume up to 5 minions per cast. The buff from consuming minions can stack endlessly.

UAzCcGYEZiA.name: Wrongwarp
implicits: (-3 to -5) Mana Cost for Spell Skills
modifiers: (-3 to -5) Mana Cost for Spell Skills

When you cast Teleport or Transplant you are teleported to a random nearby location, become immune to all damage for 1 second, and gain Chronowarp for 10 seconds.The random teleportation range is 3 to 6 metres.
Chronowarp grants 35% increased cast speed and movement speedChronowarp cannot stack

When you cast teleport or transplant you time lock up to 10 enemies around the destination for 1 second. Bosses are slowed instead of time locked.Max range of 4 meters. Timelocked enemies cannot move or attack, as if they are stunned.
(10% to 35%) Chance to gain Haste for 1 second on Hit
2% increased Spell Damage per 1% increased Movement Speed
(5 to 10)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Teleport and Transplant

UAzCsEYGZKA.name: Xithara's Conundrum
modifiers: 100% of Potion Health Converted to Ward
You have no health leechYou can still regain health through methods other than health leech
You have no health regenYou can still regain health through methods other than health regen
(25% to 30%) more Physical Damage while at Full Health
UAzCsEYGZKA.lore: Strong in times of peace, brilliant in the day, generous in times of plenty, and absent when they fade.

UAzCMGYBYE4g.name: Yrun's Penance
modifiers: (2% to 4%) of Cold Damage Leeched as Health
100% of Mana Strike Base Damage Converted to ColdWhen converted to Cold Mana Strike has a Freeze Rate of 40
100% of Fury Leap Base Damage Converted to ColdWhen converted to Cold Fury Leap has a Freeze Rate of 100
+(22% to 46%) Chance to apply Chill on Melee Hit
+(22% to 46%) Freeze Rate per stack of Chill
UAzCMGYBYE4g.lore: Like Yrun himself, the former champion's blade was imprisoned in bark and ice.

UAzAswRgJiA.name: Yrun's Wisdom
modifiers: +30 melee cold damage when above 65% health
3% of melee damage leeched as health when below 65% health
UAzAswRgJiA.lore: Yrun was wise in battle, but not in his betrayal of Heorot.

UAzCsCYEYA4g.name: Yulia's Path
modifiers: 100% of Maelstrom base damage converted to Necrotic
when Maelstrom is cast from any source your minions gain +(2 to 4) melee necrotic damage for the maximum duration of the Maelstrom
UAzCsCYEYA4g.lore: Between loyalty and opression, hope and tyranny, the path of wisdom must be found.

UAzAsEZWI.name: Zerrick's Ambition
modifiers: +(30% to 50%) Melee Critical Strike Multiplier while at Full Health
+(30% to 50%) Throwing Critical Strike Multiplier while at Full Health
Potions no longer heal you, but instead grant +54 necrotic damage to melee and throwing attacks and mark you for death for 4 seconds.Mark for Death is a curse that reduces all resistances by 25%.
18% less Poison and Necrotic Damage TakenMultiplicative with other modifiers
UAzAsEZWI.lore: In games of power you win or you die

UAzCsEYGYE4g.name: Zerrick's Greed
modifiers: Cannot Leech Health from Damage over Time
(3% to 4%) of Damage Leeched as Health on Crit
Potions no longer heal you, but instead grant +54 necrotic damage to melee and throwing attacks and mark you for death for 4 seconds.Mark for Death is a curse that reduces all resistances by 25%.
18% less Poison and Necrotic Damage TakenMultiplicative with other modifiers

UAzCMoZgDiA.name: Zerrick's Guile
modifiers: +100% Critical Strike Avoidance for 4 seconds when you use a Potion
+75% Poison Resistance for 4 seconds when you use a Potion
(15 to 20)% increased Melee and Throwing Attack Speed for 4 seconds when you use a Potion
Potions no longer heal you, but instead grant +54 necrotic damage to melee and throwing attacks and mark you for death for 4 seconds.Mark for Death is a curse that reduces all resistances by 25%.
18% less Poison and Necrotic Damage TakenMultiplicative with other modifiers
UAzCMoZgDiA.lore: Zerrick's humility and reverence for the Nagasa and the Scalebane leaders long kept him in their favour, sealing their demise.

UAzCsCZQRiA.name: Zeurial's Hunt
modifiers: When you use a Lightning Bow Attack your next Throwing Attack within 2 seconds has +(42 to 62)% Lightning Penetration
When you use a Lightning Throwing Attack your next Bow Attack within 2 seconds has +(42 to 62)% Lightning Penetration
Triggering both effects within 2 seconds grants Haste for 2 seconds

acolyte_evade.name: Evade
acolyte_evade.description: Rapidly move a short distance forwards.Evading does not grant damage immunity or prevent abilities from hitting you.Evade gains 0.5% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed per Character level.

acolyte_marrow_shards.name: Marrow Shards
acolyte_marrow_shards.description: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 9% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.
acolyte_marrow_shards.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 125% effectiveness.

acolyte_harvest.name: Harvest
acolyte_harvest.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, dealing double damage to those that are Cursed.
acolyte_harvest.additionalInfo: Unaffected by weapon range. Added damage applies at 70% effectiveness. Common curses include Marked for Death, Bone Curse and Spirit Plague.

acolyte_transplant.name: Transplant
acolyte_transplant.description: Creates a new body for you at the target location, then detonates your old body to deal physical damage to enemies around it.Instead of mana, 13% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.
acolyte_transplant.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

acolyte_sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
acolyte_sacrifice.description: Rips apart an allied minion, dealing physical damage to enemies around it.
acolyte_sacrifice.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 400% effectiveness.

acolyte_summon_skeleton.name: Summon Skeleton
acolyte_summon_skeleton.description: Summon a Skeleton Mage to fight your enemies. It casts Hungering Souls every second.

acolyte_bone_curse.name: Bone Curse
acolyte_bone_curse.description: Apply a curse to enemies in an area for 8 seconds that causes physical damage when hit. The damage is tripled if you inflicted the hit yourself.
acolyte_bone_curse.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 20% effectiveness to each hit.When the curse deals damage it counts as an additional hit, but cannot apply ailments from effects such as "chance to ignite on hit".

acolyte_summon_volatile_zombie.name: Summon Volatile Zombie
acolyte_summon_volatile_zombie.description: Summons a Volatile Zombie which trudges towards the nearest enemy. When it reaches an enemy or dies, it explodes dealing physical and fire damage to surrounding enemies.
acolyte_summon_volatile_zombie.additionalInfo: You are limited to 6 active zombies. Summoning more will cause older ones to explode.Volatile Zombies' have 200 base health and their health decays at an accelerating rate.Press A to give your minions an attack command.

acolyte_summon_bone_golem.name: Summon Bone Golem
acolyte_summon_bone_golem.description: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 70 damage.

acolyte_assemble_abomination.name: Assemble Abomination
acolyte_assemble_abomination.description: Hold ability key to channel to absorb your Wraiths, Summoned Skeletons, Skeletal Mages, Golems, and Volatile Zombies in an area. When you release, summon a single hulking abomination with added health and more damage per minion absorbed.The abomination remembers the minions absorbed to create it and will rapidly devour those minions to restore 10% of its maximum health.
acolyte_assemble_abomination.additionalInfo: Abomination gains health equal to the max health of minions consumed and 5% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per minion consumed (up to 20 minions).All minions of the same type are devoured if any one of them are absorbed. For example, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Rogues, and Skeleton Archers are the same type of Summoned Skeleton.

acolyte_drain_life.name: Drain Life
acolyte_drain_life.description: Channelled spell that targets up to 3 enemies around the target location, dealing necrotic damage over time and leeching 30% of that damage back as health.
acolyte_drain_life.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 360% effectiveness per second.

acolyte_death_seal.name: Death Seal
acolyte_death_seal.description: Releases a Wave of Death dealing damage based on how long Death Seal has been actve and your current percent missing health.

acolyte_reaper_form.name: Reaper Form
acolyte_reaper_form.description: Take on the mantle of death itself and transform into a Reaper, temporarily gaining the Reap ability. While in Reaper Form, your health regen does not apply and your health decays over time. When your health reaches 0 instead of dying you transform back to human form and are healed to full health.
acolyte_reaper_form.additionalInfo: Reap is a short ranged dash. It deals melee damage to enemies you pass through and heals you for each enemy hit. This healing scales with your increased healing effectiveness.The rate at which your health decays in reaper form is not based on your current or maximum health.The health decay accelerates while you remain in reaper form.If you take more damage than your remaining health in Reaper Form, the excess damage will be dealt to your human form health.

acolyte_ghostflame.name: Ghostflame
acolyte_ghostflame.description: Channel to releases a continuous jet of horrid flames in front of you dealing fire and necrotic damage over time.
acolyte_ghostflame.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 600% effectiveness each second. Damage reduces while rotating.

acolyte_soul_feast.name: Soul Feast
acolyte_soul_feast.description: Feasts on the souls of cursed enemies, dealing necrotic damage to them, and drawing fragments of their souls back to you. The soul fragments each grant 3 ward when they reach you.Feasts on up to 13 enemies, prioritising those closest to you.
acolyte_soul_feast.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 250% effectiveness.

acolyte_infernal_shade.name: Infernal Shade
acolyte_infernal_shade.description: Target enemy and all nearby enemies take fire damage per second. Each enemy can only have one Infernal Shade attached at a time. Expires after 5 seconds. Max 4 active shades.
acolyte_infernal_shade.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 250% effectiveness each second.Your maximum number of shades is shared with Dread Shade.

acolyte_chaos_bolts.name: Chaos Bolts
acolyte_chaos_bolts.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at five times its normal value.

acolyte_profane_veil.name: Profane Veil
acolyte_profane_veil.description: Channel to conceal yourself within a Profane Veil that deals necrotic damage over time to enemies around you. While concealed you dodge every Hit, but you can still take damage from damage over time effects, such as ailments, and you move more slowly.Last for up to 2 seconds (also ends when you release the key). Cooldown does not recover during use.
acolyte_profane_veil.additionalInfo: You have 40% less movement speed while channeling (multiplicative with other modifiers).Added spell damage applies at 200% effectiveness per second.

acolyte_chthonic_fissure.name: Chthonic Fissure
acolyte_chthonic_fissure.description: Opens an infernal fissure in the ground, dealing fire damage over time to enemies on top of it, as well as releasing Spirits from the fissure that seek nearby enemies. These spirits inflict enemies with Torment, a Curse that slows and deals necrotic damage over time.Max 1 active fissure.
acolyte_chthonic_fissure.additionalInfo: Added damage for the Fissure applies at 120% effectiveness each second.Added damage for the Spirits applies at 30% effectiveness.Torment applies 18% less movement speed (multiplicative with other modifiers), deals 120 damage over 3 seconds and added damage applies at 200% effectiveness per second.

acolyte_rip_blood.name: Rip Blood
acolyte_rip_blood.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 5 health when it reaches you.
acolyte_rip_blood.additionalInfo: Affected by increases to Healing Effectiveness.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

acolyte_wandering_spirits.name: Wandering Spirits
acolyte_wandering_spirits.description: Reveals wandering spirits around you for 6 seconds. The spirits wander at random dealing necrotic damage over time to enemies they pass through.4 spirits are revealed immediately after casting the skill and 17 more are revealed over the next 6 seconds.The spirits individually last up to 4 seconds, but all remaining spirits fade once the reveal duration ends.
acolyte_wandering_spirits.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies to each spirit's damage at 200% effectiveness per second.Increased Area stats affect the area of effect of each individual spirit, but not the area in which spirits are revealed.

acolyte_hungering_souls.name: Hungering Souls
acolyte_hungering_souls.description: Calls forth five hungering souls that seeks out enemies, on hit they deal necrotic damage and then possesses the target.Possessed enemies take necrotic damage over time for 1.5 seconds. Enemies cannot be possessed by multiple souls at once.
acolyte_hungering_souls.additionalInfo: Possess's damage counts as spell damage and it is affected by modifiers to base spell damage.Added spell damage applies to the initial hit at 45% effectiveness and to possess at 75% effectiveness over its full duration.

acolyte_spirit_plague.name: Spirit Plague
acolyte_spirit_plague.description: Curses a target with a powerful necrotic damage over time effect which lasts 3 seconds. Spreads to a single nearby target on target death.
acolyte_spirit_plague.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 150% effectiveness per second.

acolyte_summon_skeletal_mage.name: Summon Skeletal Mage
acolyte_summon_skeletal_mage.description: Summons a Skeletal Mage to assist you. You are limited to 2 Skeletal Mages at a time.Skeletal Mages cast Dread Bolt, which has 150% added damage effectiveness and has a 50% chance to apply Damned on hit.
acolyte_summon_skeletal_mage.additionalInfo: Skeletal Mages have 100 base health.You will always summon the Skeletal Mage type you have the fewest of.

acolyte_dread_shade.name: Dread Shade
acolyte_dread_shade.description: Your minion's health is drained for 3% of its max health per second for each second the shade has been active, but it and your minions around it deal +10 necrotic damage with spells and attacks and have 50% increased necrotic damage.
acolyte_dread_shade.additionalInfo: Each minion only benefits from one Dread Shade aura. Max 4 active shades.Your maximum number of shades is shared with Infernal Shade.

acolyte_summon_wraith.name: Summon Wraith
acolyte_summon_wraith.description: Summons a wraith that rapidly fades from this world, but will seek and attack your foes while it remains.
acolyte_summon_wraith.additionalInfo: You are limited to 6 active wraiths.Wraiths have 60 base health.

acolyte_aura_of_decay.name: Aura Of Decay
acolyte_aura_of_decay.description: Toggles Aura of Decay, which poisons you every second, and leaves a trail of decay. Enemies near you or in the trail are poisoned four times a second, and your chance to poison on hit applies to each of these instances at 100% effectiveness.While Aura of Decay is active you take 30% less poison damage. Additionally, you take 50% less damage from your own Aura of Decay.
acolyte_aura_of_decay.additionalInfo: Your chance to poison on hit does not increase the rate at which poison is applied to you.

acolyte_flay.name: Flay
acolyte_flay.description: Spirit Step up to 3 meters towards an enemy if not within range, then perform a narrow rending slash.Each enemy killed by the melee attack will release a Blood Eruption, a spell dealing physical damage in an area.Enemies can be hit by both Flay and all Blood Eruptions that occur.
acolyte_flay.additionalInfo: The melee attack has 200% effectiveness of added melee damage.The Blood Eruption has 200% effectiveness of added spell damage.

mage_evade.name: Evade
mage_evade.description: Rapidly move a short distance forwards.Evading does not grant damage immunity or prevent abilities from hitting you.Evade gains 0.5% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed per Character level.

mage_mana_strike.name: Mana Strike
mage_mana_strike.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you, returning 15 mana if it hits an enemy.Deals 15 base lightning damage.
mage_mana_strike.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

mage_flame_ward.name: Flame Ward
mage_flame_ward.description: Grants a burst of 400 ward. Then for 3 seconds, hits deal 30% less damage to you and cause a retaliatory burst of flames.
mage_flame_ward.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies ot the burst of flames at 200% effectiveness.The area of effect of the burst of flames scales with increased Area of Area Skills stats.

mage_focus.name: Focus
mage_focus.description: Hold ability key to channel. While channelling you have 100% increased mana regen and gain 10 ward per second. After channelling for exactly one second you recover 10% of missing mana and gain a burst of 40 mana and ward.

mage_enchant_weapon.name: Enchant Weapon
mage_enchant_weapon.description: Active: Enchant your weapon with elemental power. Your melee attacks deal 50% more elemental damage for 5 seconds.Passive: Your melee attacks deal 15% more elemental damage.

mage_lightning_blast.name: Lightning Blast
mage_lightning_blast.description: Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.Drains 20 mana per second.
mage_lightning_blast.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 250% effectiveness each second. Damage reduces while rotating.

mage_fireball.name: Fireball
mage_fireball.description: Cast a ball of fire towards the target. Added spell damage applies at 175% effectiveness.

mage_elemental_nova.name: Elemental Nova
mage_elemental_nova.description: Cast a ball of fire dealing moderate damage

mage_static.name: Static
mage_static.description: Static charges up as you move or when you get hit. Activate Static to discharge what you have built up, striking up to 5 nearby enemies with lightning.100 charges maximum. Deals 4% more damage per charge.
mage_static.additionalInfo: By default static gains 5 charges per second while moving, and also gains 5 charges whenever you take a hit.Added spell damage applies at 250% effectiveness.

mage_volcanic_orb.name: Volcanic Orb
mage_volcanic_orb.description: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.
mage_volcanic_orb.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

mage_static_orb.name: Static Orb
mage_static_orb.description: Casts an orb in a target direction that deals lightning damage and pulls enemies that it hits towards it as it travels. At the target location it explodes, dealing lightning damage to enemies surrounding it and also striking up to 5 enemies further out. The further it travels the higher the damage and area of effect of the explosion, up to 100%.
mage_static_orb.additionalInfo: As the area of effect of the explosion increases so does the maximum range at which it can strike additional enemies. Increased Area for Area Skills stats also affect both and are additive with this increase.Static Orb's added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness and the explosion added damages is applied at 200% effectiveness.

mage_meteor.name: Meteor
mage_meteor.description: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at 950% effectiveness.

mage_runebolt.name: Runebolt
mage_runebolt.description: A combo spell that fires piercing projectiles. The first part of the combo is fire, the second is cold, and the third is lightning.
mage_runebolt.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness. The cold rune bolt has a freeze rate of 40.

mage_surge.name: Surge
mage_surge.description: Quick fixed distance dash which hits all enemies in the path with a lightning melee attack.
mage_surge.additionalInfo: Added melee damage applies at 200% effectiveness.Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

mage_glyph_of_dominion.name: Glyph of Dominion
mage_glyph_of_dominion.description: Places a lightning glyph on the ground that grows over time. Deals lightning damage over time and slows in its area. At full size it detonates, dealing large amounts of lightning damage to enemies within its area. You can have a maximum of one Glyph at a time by default.
mage_glyph_of_dominion.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the damage over time at 150% effectiveness each second, and to the explosion at 200% effectiveness.The glyph and its explosion gain up to 150% more radius (multiplicative with other modifiers) over the course of its growth. Modifiers to duration do not affect the total growth.

mage_runic_invocation.name: Runic Invocation
mage_runic_invocation.description: Passive: Whenever you directly use an elemental skill, gain 1 Rune of the corresponding element. For channelled skills you gain 1 rune per second instead.Active: Consume all of your active Runes to cast a unique Invocation based on the combination and order of runes consumed.The last Rune in the sequence determines the damage type.Casting a fire skill grants a Rah Rune.Casting a lightning skill grants a Gon Rune.Casting a cold skill grants a Heo Rune.
mage_runic_invocation.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at varying effectiveness and for Invocations, but the more Runes you have before casting an Invocation the more powerful they become and the more mana they cost.

mage_frost_claw.name: Frost Claw
mage_frost_claw.description: Three projectiles arc to the target location to create a burst of frost. Added spell damage applies to the burst at 100% effectiveness and it has a freeze rate of 40.

mage_flame_reave.name: Flame Reave
mage_flame_reave.description: A melee attack that release a wave of flames from your weapon cleaving through enemies in a cone infront of you. Deals up to 50% less damage to distant enemies. Deals 16 additional base fire damage. Other added melee damage applies at 200% effectiveness.

mage_firebrand.name: Firebrand
mage_firebrand.description: A melee attack which grants you a stack of Firebrand buff if it hits an enemy. Each stack of the Firebrand buff increases the size of subsequent Firebrand attacks and adds melee fire damage.
mage_firebrand.additionalInfo: Firebrand can stack up to 4 times. Each stack grants +5 melee fire damage, increases the size of Firebrand attacks by 25% and lasts for 4 seconds.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

mage_shatter_strike.name: Shatter Strike
mage_shatter_strike.description: A sweeping melee attack of 2 arcs that strikes enemies in a circle around you dealing cold damage and instantly kills frozen enemies below 10% health.Enemies in the middle of the attack are hit twice, where the arcs overlap.
mage_shatter_strike.additionalInfo: Has a freeze rate of 50.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

mage_flame_rush.name: Flame Rush
mage_flame_rush.description: You turn into a ball of flame and launch yourself in the target direction. The longer you hold down the key, the slower you move, but the larger and more damaging the explosion is when you stop channeling. You take 40% less damage during Flame Rush.
mage_flame_rush.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the hit from passing through enemies at 100% effectiveness, and to the explosion at 200% effectiveness.The explosion gains up to 150% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and 150% increased area based on time spent channeling.

mage_snap_freeze.name: Snap Freeze
mage_snap_freeze.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.20% of remaining cooldown recovered whenever you freeze an enemy, including with Snap Freeze itself. This effect can occur a maximum of two times each second.

mage_disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
mage_disintegrate.description: Channel to create a beam of pure energy in the target direction. The beam deals fire and lightning damage to all enemies caught in it.
mage_disintegrate.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 480% effectiveness each second. Damage reduces while rotating.

mage_ice_barrage.name: Ice Barrage
mage_ice_barrage.description: Opens a rift that repeatedly shoots a barrage of ice shards in a target direction for 5 seconds.
mage_ice_barrage.additionalInfo: Ice Shards are cold projectiles that will curve to nearby targets.The shards have a freeze rate of 40.Added damage is applied at 120% effectiveness.

mage_arcane_ascendance.name: Arcane Ascendance
mage_arcane_ascendance.description: Toggle to prevent movement and drain 25 mana each second. Mana drain increases by 1 mana per second. All spells cost +5 mana to cast. 100% increased spell damage and 50% increased cast speed.

mage_black_hole.name: Black Hole
mage_black_hole.description: Summon a powerful black hole at target location that aggressively pulls enemies and deals cold damage over time to enemies within its reach.
mage_black_hole.additionalInfo: Added spell damage is applied at 600% effectiveness per second. The Black Hole persists for 2.75s by default.

mage_frost_wall.name: Frost Wall
mage_frost_wall.description: Creates a wall of frost which persists for 6 seconds. Enemies inside the wall take cold damage over time and receive a stack of chill every 0.25 seconds. You can have up to 1 active Frost Wall at a time.Enemies that reach the wall at least 0.2 seconds after it's been created are frozen for twice as long as the wall has existed, up to a 2 second freeze duration. Bosses cannot be frozen in this way.
mage_frost_wall.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 400% effectiveness per second and the damage over time has a freeze rate of 80 per second.

primalist_evade.name: Evade
primalist_evade.description: Rapidly move a short distance forwards.Evading does not grant damage immunity or prevent abilities from hitting you.Evade gains 0.5% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed per Character level.

primalist_gathering_storm.name: Gathering Storm
primalist_gathering_storm.description: Strike at your enemy with a mighty lightning powered storm. When you use Gathering Storm and hit at least one enemy, you gain a Storm Stack. Every second you expend a Storm Stack to cause a Storm Bolt to strike a nearby enemy. This interval is reduced by 2% for every stack you currently have.
primalist_gathering_storm.additionalInfo: The attack deals melee lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness, and the Storm Bolt deals spell lightning damage with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness.Increased area for area skills stats apply to the melee attack and to the damage area of the Storm Bolt, but not to the area in which enemies are targeted by Storm Bolts.

primalist_summon_thorn_totem.name: Summon Thorn Totem
primalist_summon_thorn_totem.description: Summons a totem that fires thorns at nearby enemies. You can have a maximum of two thorn totems by default.
primalist_summon_thorn_totem.additionalInfo: Totems scale with your minion or totem stats, not your stats.Added minion spell damage applies at 75% effectiveness for the Thorns fired by the Thorn Totem.Thorn totems have 120 base health and last 6 seconds by default.

primalist_swipe.name: Swipe
primalist_swipe.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

primalist_tempest_strike.name: Tempest Strike
primalist_tempest_strike.description: A melee combo attack that cycles through a cold strike, a physical strike, and a lightning strike that trigger elemental Tempest spells of the same damage type if the strikes hit at least one enemy.Cold strike: Triggers a Frigid Tempest, which is a cold projectile that pierces through enemies.Physical strike: Triggers a Wind Tempest, which is a small twister that lasts a short duration dealing physical damage per over time.Lightning strike: Triggers a Thunder Tempest, which is an expanding storm of lightning bolts.
primalist_tempest_strike.additionalInfo: Added damage for the melee strikes apply at 100% effectiveness.Frigid Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness.Wind Tempest: Added damage applies at 150% effectiveness per second.Thunder Tempest: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

primalist_maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
primalist_maelstrom.description: Surrounds you with a freezing Maelstrom that deals cold damage over time to nearby enemies.Can be cast repeatedly to create multiple maelstroms at once. Each Maelstrom lasts 7 seconds.
primalist_maelstrom.additionalInfo: Each Maelstrom has a base freeze rate per second of 24.Added spell damage applies to each Maelstrom at 80% effectiveness per second.

primalist_upheaval.name: Upheaval
primalist_upheaval.description: Sunders the ground in a line in front of you, dealing damage to enemies along the path.
primalist_upheaval.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

primalist_eterra_s_blessing.name: Eterra's Blessing
primalist_eterra_s_blessing.description: The nearest allied target is healed for 100 health. If the target is one of your minions then the healing is tripled and the minion is energised for 4 seconds, increasing its size by 20% and its damage by 100%.

primalist_warcry.name: Warcry
primalist_warcry.description: Unleash a mighty roar that knocks back nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Rares and bosses are stunned for half as long.20% of remaining cooldown recovered whenever you stun (or freeze if Warcry is converted to cold) an enemy, including with Warcry itself. This effect can occur a maximum of two times each second.

primalist_summon_wolf.name: Summon Wolf
primalist_summon_wolf.description: Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.While you have your maximum number of wolves, the ability is replaced with Howl.The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_wolf.additionalInfo: The Wolf has 220 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_summon_storm_crows.name: Summon Storm Crows
primalist_summon_storm_crows.description: Summons Storm Crows up to your companion limit. The Storm Crow casts spells from a distance. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The Storm Crow counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_storm_crows.additionalInfo: The crow has 200 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_serpent_strike.name: Serpent Strike
primalist_serpent_strike.description: Requires a spear.A melee attack with 140% poison chance.Poisons inflicted by serpent strike last 40% longer.

effects: +4% Chance to apply Poison on Melee Hit

primalist_serpent_strike.additionalInfo: Poison chance above 100% gives a chance to apply additional stacks of poison (this mechanic applies to all hits, not just Serpent Strike).Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

primalist_summon_bear.name: Summon Bear
primalist_summon_bear.description: Summons a primal bear that follows you into combat. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The bear counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_bear.additionalInfo: Primals bears have 300 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_summon_scorpion.name: Summon Scorpion
primalist_summon_scorpion.description: Summons a scorpion that follows you into combat. Its attacks with its tails inflict a long lasting poison. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The scorpion counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_scorpion.additionalInfo: The scorpion has 400 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_summon_frenzy_totem.name: Summon Frenzy Totem
primalist_summon_frenzy_totem.description: Summons a totem that grants Frenzy to all nearby allies. Frenzy increases attack and cast speed by 20%.
primalist_summon_frenzy_totem.additionalInfo: Frenzy totems have 120 base health and last 6 seconds.

primalist_summon_sabertooth.name: Summon Sabertooth
primalist_summon_sabertooth.description: Summons a primal sabertooth cat that leaps into combat. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The sabertooth cat counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_sabertooth.additionalInfo: The sabertooth has 240 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_summon_raptor.name: Summon Raptor
primalist_summon_raptor.description: Summons a primal raptor that ferociously attacks your enemies. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The raptor counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_raptor.additionalInfo: The raptor has 240 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_tornado.name: Tornado
primalist_tornado.description: Conjures a tornado that moves at random, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing physical damage to them.
primalist_tornado.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the damage over time at 125% effectiveness per second.

primalist_earthquake.name: Earthquake
primalist_earthquake.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area around you sending out tremors to nearby enemies.

primalist_avalanche.name: Avalanche
primalist_avalanche.description: Launches an icy boulder from the sky.
primalist_avalanche.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 300% effectiveness.

primalist_summon_storm_totem.name: Summon Storm Totem
primalist_summon_storm_totem.description: Summons a totem that casts lightning storms around nearby enemies.Storm totems last 8 seconds, and you cannot control more than 1 at once.

primalist_spriggan_form.name: Spriggan Form
primalist_spriggan_form.description: Transform into a forest spriggan, increasing your spell casting capabilities, and gaining 4 new abilities.Your mana is replaced with Rage while in spriggan form. When your Rage reaches 0 you automatically transform back into your human form. Your starting Rage is equal to your maximum mana. Rage slowly decays over time at a constant rate.
primalist_spriggan_form.additionalInfo: The four new abilities are: Spirit Thorns, Thorn Shield, Summon Vine and Summon Healing Totem.While in spriggan form you have 50% increased spell damage and +300 armor.

primalist_summon_spriggan.name: Summon Spriggan
primalist_summon_spriggan.description: Summon a spriggan that casts spells to attack your enemies and has a passive Healing Aura that restores 10 health per second. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.The spriggan counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.
primalist_summon_spriggan.additionalInfo: The spriggan has 160 base health and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

primalist_swarmblade_form.name: Swarmblade Form
primalist_swarmblade_form.description: Transform into an agile Swarmblade, increasing your melee capabilities, and gaining 4 new abilities.Your mana is replaced with Rage while in swarmblade form. When your Rage reaches 0 you automatically transform back into your human form. Your starting Rage is equal to your maximum mana. Rage slowly decays over time at a constant rate.
primalist_swarmblade_form.additionalInfo: The four new abilities are: Armblade Slashes, Swarm Strike, Dash and Summon Hive.While in Swarmblade Form you have 10% increased melee attack speed and movement speed.

primalist_entangling_roots.name: Entangling Roots
primalist_entangling_roots.description: Smites a target enemy with a bolt of holy fire that descends from the sky, healing allies around the target for 60 health. If you are in the area you are also healed.Cannot be used without a target.
primalist_entangling_roots.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 150% effectiveness

primalist_werebear_form.name: Werebear Form
primalist_werebear_form.description: Transform into a ferocious werebear, increasing your physical capabilities and gaining 4 new abilities. Your mana is replaced with Rage while in werebear form. When your Rage reaches 0 you automatically transform back into your human form. Your starting Rage is equal to your maximum mana. Rage slowly decays over time at a constant rate.
primalist_werebear_form.additionalInfo: The four new abilities are: Rampage, Swipe, Maul and Roar. Swipe and Roar inherit all bonuses from your Swipe and Warcry skill trees.While in bear form you have 50% increased melee damage and 15% increased health.

rogue_evade.name: Evade
rogue_evade.description: Rapidly move a short distance forwards.Evading does not grant damage immunity or prevent abilities from hitting you.Evade gains 0.5% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed per Character level.

rogue_shift.name: Shift
rogue_shift.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction.
rogue_shift.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

rogue_puncture.name: Puncture
rogue_puncture.description: An extended melee stab or piercing bow attack that has a 30% chance to inflict bleed on hit. Bleeds inflicted by puncture have 30% increased duration.
rogue_puncture.additionalInfo: When using a bow, Puncture deals 5% less damage to each subsequent enemy hit up to 20% less damage.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

rogue_smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
rogue_smoke_bomb.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction.
rogue_smoke_bomb.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

rogue_decoy.name: Decoy
rogue_decoy.description: Throw a device to create a decoy that taunts enemies around it for 3 seconds before exploding.
rogue_decoy.additionalInfo: Added throwing attack damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to the explosion.

rogue_flurry.name: Flurry
rogue_flurry.description: A bow or melee attack that performs 3 rapid strikes. The last strike can be cancelled by moving.
rogue_flurry.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 80% effectiveness to each strike and each strike has a 40% reduced chance to apply ailments on hit.Increased Area for Area skills stats only affect the melee version of Flurry.

rogue_umbral_blades.name: Umbral Blades
rogue_umbral_blades.description: Recall all Umbral Blades to you, hitting enemies along the way.
rogue_umbral_blades.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 60% effectiveness. 40% less chance to apply ailments on hit.

rogue_synchronized_strike.name: Synchronized Strike
rogue_synchronized_strike.description: Requires a melee weapon.Jump forward and strike in an area in front of you while shadows appear and simultaneously strike on either side of you.

rogue_lethal_mirage.name: Lethal Mirage
rogue_lethal_mirage.description: Become immune for a duration and rapidly strike nearby targets with 6 mirages.
rogue_lethal_mirage.additionalInfo: Mirages' added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.Increased Area for Area Skills stats apply to the attacks of individual mirages, but not to the maximum range at which mirages can be created.

rogue_dancing_strikes.name: Dancing Strikes
rogue_dancing_strikes.description: Requires dual wielding.A series of fast dash attacks. Dancing Strikes' movement does not scale with attack speed, but it gains increased cooldown recovery speed and more damage equal to 50% of your total increased melee attack speed.
rogue_dancing_strikes.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied to each attack at 150% effectiveness.Your total increased melee attack speed includes the modifier from attack rate and generic increased attack speed stats. If your Melee Attack Speed is 1.5, then Dancing Strikes gains 25% increased cooldown recovery speed and 25% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

rogue_ballista.name: Ballista
rogue_ballista.description: Summons a ballista that fires bolts at nearby enemies.
rogue_ballista.additionalInfo: Ballistae have 1000 base health and last 10 seconds by default. Enemies rarely target ballistas.

rogue_multishot.name: Multishot
rogue_multishot.description: Requires a bow.A bow attack that fires a cone of 5 arrows in the target direction. Aiming the cursor further from your character reduces the spread.
rogue_multishot.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 120% effectiveness

rogue_hail_of_arrows.name: Hail of Arrows
rogue_hail_of_arrows.description: Requires a bow.Launch a hail of arrows into the sky that rain down on the target location over 3.5 seconds.
rogue_hail_of_arrows.additionalInfo: Added bow damage is applied at 325% effectiveness per second.

rogue_detonating_arrow.name: Detonating Arrow
rogue_detonating_arrow.description: Requires a bow.Fires an arrow that embeds itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds.
rogue_detonating_arrow.additionalInfo: Added bow damage applies to the arrow at 125% effectiveness and to the explosion at 200% effectiveness.

rogue_explosive_trap.name: Explosive Trap
rogue_explosive_trap.description: Throw a device to create a Decoy that taunts enemies around it for 2.5 seconds before exploding.
rogue_explosive_trap.additionalInfo: Added throwing attack damage is applied at 600% effectiveness to the explosion.The Decoy cannot be destroyed before it expires.

rogue_net.name: Net
rogue_net.description: Leaps backwards and throws a net which snares enemies and deals physical damage. Netted bosses and rare enemies have 35% less movement speed, and other enemies are immobilized.
rogue_net.additionalInfo: Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.Nets last 3-5 seconds at random on each enemy.

rogue_aerial_assault.name: Aerial Assault
rogue_aerial_assault.description: Freezes enemies in a cone in front of you. Freeze lasts for 2 seconds.

rogue_dive_bomb.name: Dive Bomb
rogue_dive_bomb.description: Your Falcon ascends high into the sky then dive bombs the target location at high speed, dealing a high amount of physical damage to enemies in the area.
rogue_dive_bomb.additionalInfo: Your falcon's added damage applies at 500% effectiveness.If Dive Bomb is interrupted before impact, 70% of the cooldown and mana cost are recovered.

rogue_falconry.name: Falconry
rogue_falconry.description: Passive:Summons a Falcon that fights with you.Active:Falcon Strikes: The Falcon rapidly hits many enemies in the target area.
rogue_falconry.additionalInfo: The Falcon cannot take damage and is untargetable by enemies. Press A to give your minions an attack command.

rogue_acid_flask.name: Acid Flask
rogue_acid_flask.description: Throw a flask of acid that explodes dealing physical damage on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

rogue_cinder_strike.name: Cinder Strike
rogue_cinder_strike.description: Melee or bow combo with three attacks. The first attack also creates a fiery explosion, damaging nearby enemies.
rogue_cinder_strike.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 2 seconds without using Cinder Strike.Added damage applies to the first attack at 200% effectiveness, and to the other attacks at 100% effectiveness.

rogue_shadow_cascade.name: Shadow Cascade
rogue_shadow_cascade.description: Requires dual wielding.A circular attack that's also used by your shadow clones.
rogue_shadow_cascade.additionalInfo: Added damages is applied at 200% effectiveness. Base critical strike chance is 10%, instead of the normal 5%.

rogue_dark_quiver.name: Dark Quiver
rogue_dark_quiver.description: Requires a bow.Summons 7 Black Arrows that rain from the sky over 4 seconds, granting 100% increased damage to your next bow attack when retrieved.
rogue_dark_quiver.additionalInfo: You can hold up to 3 Black Arrows at once, but can only expend one at a time.

rogue_heartseeker.name: Heartseeker
rogue_heartseeker.description: Requires a bow.Shoot an arrow that seeks the heart of a nearby target, passing harmlessly through other enemies. Whenever it hits its target it has a chance to continue through it and Recurve to strike it again. Subsequent Recurve chance is multiplied by 0.8 each time the arrow Recurves. If the target dies, it will choose a new target.
rogue_heartseeker.additionalInfo: Base recurve chance is 100%.Added damage applies at 100% effectiveness.

sentinel_evade.name: Evade
sentinel_evade.description: Rapidly move a short distance forwards.Evading does not grant damage immunity or prevent abilities from hitting you.Evade gains 0.5% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed per Character level.

sentinel_shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
sentinel_shield_bash.description: Requires a shield.A melee directional attack that stuns enemies for 1 second. 100% increased stun duration against non-boss enemies.1.5% more damage per 1% block chance (up to 150%, multiplicative with other modifiers).20% of remaining cooldown recovered whenever you stun an enemy, including with Shield Bash itself. This effect can occur a maximum of two times each second.
sentinel_shield_bash.additionalInfo: Increased attack speed has no effect for Shield Bash.Added damage is applied at 150% effectiveness.

sentinel_shield_throw.name: Shield Throw
sentinel_shield_throw.description: Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.
sentinel_shield_throw.additionalInfo: The shield hits all enemies in its path, even those it does not ricochet from.Added throwing attack damage is applied at 200% effectiveness.

sentinel_healing_hands.name: Healing Hands
sentinel_healing_hands.description: Dash a short fixed distance in the target direction.
sentinel_healing_hands.additionalInfo: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

sentinel_smite.name: Smite
sentinel_smite.description: Smites a target enemy with a bolt of holy fire that descends from the sky, healing allies around the target for 60 health. If you are in the area you are also healed.Cannot be used without a target.
sentinel_smite.additionalInfo: Added spell damage applies at 150% effectiveness

sentinel_holy_aura.name: Holy Aura
sentinel_holy_aura.description: You and nearby allies passively gain 30% increased damage and +15% additional elemental resistance. Activating Holy Aura doubles the stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

sentinel_hammer_throw.name: Hammer Throw
sentinel_hammer_throw.description: Throws a hammer that returns to you after a short delay.Added Throwing Damage is applied to each hit at 110% effectiveness.
sentinel_hammer_throw.additionalInfo: This is a throwing attack that scales with throwing attack damage and throwing attack speed. It is not a melee attack or spell.

sentinel_manifest_armor.name: Manifest Armor
sentinel_manifest_armor.description: Manifests an animated set of heavy armor, which attacks slowly.Stats granted by your body armor, helmet, gloves and boots also apply to your Manifest Armor.
sentinel_manifest_armor.additionalInfo: Manifested Armors have 400 base health.Manifest Armor has a 30% chance to retaliate with Forge Nova when hit. This effect deals 40 spell fire damage with added damage applying at 200% effectiveness, applies fire resistance shred to enemies hit and has a 2 second cooldown.

sentinel_forge_strike.name: Forge Strike
sentinel_forge_strike.description: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you.25% chance on hit to summon a Forged Weapon which lasts for 20 seconds and is affected by the stats and attack rate of your weapon. You can control up to 6 Forged Weapons at once.
sentinel_forge_strike.additionalInfo: Added melee damage applies at 600% effectiveness.

sentinel_void_cleave.name: Void Cleave
sentinel_void_cleave.description: Requires a 2-handed sword or axe.A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Can be echoed by Void Knights. Unaffected by weapon range.

sentinel_volatile_reversal.name: Volatile Reversal
sentinel_volatile_reversal.description: A combo ability that jumps forwards in time to a target location and performs a melee attack on arrival. Recast within 3 seconds to jump backwards in time to your original location and perform a melee attack on arrival.
sentinel_volatile_reversal.additionalInfo: Added damage applies to the melee attacks at 200% effectiveness.

sentinel_abyssal_echoes.name: Abyssal Echoes
sentinel_abyssal_echoes.description: A nova that echoes from up to 8 enemies it reaches and applies abyssal decay. Enemies with abyssal decay take void damage over time for 5 seconds, if they take a hit all the damage from abyssal decay is dealt to them immediately.
sentinel_abyssal_echoes.additionalInfo: Abyssal decay deals a total of 100 void damage over its duration, with added spell damage applied at 100% effectiveness each second.Abyssal Echoes cannot apply other on hit effects on hit.

sentinel_devouring_orb.name: Devouring Orb
sentinel_devouring_orb.description: Creates a devouring orb at the target location for 10 seconds that deals void damage over time to nearby enemies, and casts a void rift whenever something dies nearby, hitting nearby enemies to deal void damage.Each successive rift has 12% more damage and area of effect, capped at an increase of 120%.
sentinel_devouring_orb.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied to the damage over time area at 100% effectiveness per second, and to the Void Rifts at 75% effectiveness.Devouring orb cannot cast more than one void rift every 0.1 seconds.

sentinel_anomaly.name: Anomaly
sentinel_anomaly.description: Brings enemies that were sent forward back to your time.

sentinel_vengeance.name: Vengeance
sentinel_vengeance.description: A melee attack that also prepares you to riposte incoming hits.If vengeance successfully hits an enemy and you take a hit in the next 2 seconds you will riposte, taking 25% less damage and striking at a nearby enemy.
sentinel_vengeance.additionalInfo: Added damage is applied at 125% effectiveness to the initial hit and 150% effectiveness to the riposte.

sentinel_rive.name: Rive
sentinel_rive.description: A combo of three melee attacks. Every third consecutive attack with Rive slashes in a full circle around the character, dealing double damage.
sentinel_rive.additionalInfo: The consecutive attack counter resets if you go 3 seconds without using Rive.Added melee damage applies to the first two hits at 125% effectiveness and to the third hit at 250% effectiveness.

sentinel_javelin.name: Javelin
sentinel_javelin.description: Hurl a javelin that pierces through every enemy in its path.
sentinel_javelin.additionalInfo: This is a throwing attack that scales with throwing attack damage and throwing attack speed. It is not a melee attack or spell.

sentinel_multistrike.name: Multistrike
sentinel_multistrike.description: A melee attack that grants a stack of Armament if you hit at least one enemy.Armament stacks up to 2 times and each stack lasts 3 seconds.Each stack of Armament causes an additional sword to strike a nearby enemy when you use Multistrike.
sentinel_multistrike.additionalInfo: Additional swords cannot target the enemy you initially hit or enemies targeted by other swords.Added damage is applied at 100% effectiveness.

sentinel_ring_of_shields.name: Ring Of Shields
sentinel_ring_of_shields.description: Manifests a ring of shields around you.Each shield has 75 base health and lasts up to 10 seconds. Shields draw enemy aggression and block projectiles.Stats on your equipped shield also apply to the shields created by Ring of Shields

sentinel_symbols_of_hope.name: Symbols of Hope
sentinel_symbols_of_hope.description: Every 2 seconds, summons a symbol that orbits you, causing you and your allies' attacks and spells to deal 3 additional fire damage and increasing health regeneration by 20%.Activate to consume the symbols, granting 100 ward and 5% less damage taken per symbol for 3 seconds.You can have up to 3 symbols at a time.

ambusher.name: Ambusher
ambusher.description: Increases attack, cast and move speed

ancient_flight.name: Ancient Flight
effects: +2 Arrows with Flurry while using a BowAdditional arrows cannot hit the same target as the first

apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
apocalypse.description: Increased void damage and melee critical strike multiplier

arcane_ascendance.name: Arcane Ascendance
arcane_ascendance.description: Accelerating mana drain. Additional spell mana cost. Increased spell damage and increased cast speed. Deals lightning damage to nearby enemies.

aspect_of_the_crow.name: Aspect of the Crow
aspect_of_the_crow.description: Grants +3 melee lightning damage and +3 spell lightning damage.

aspect_of_the_spider.name: Aspect of the Spider
aspect_of_the_spider.description: Slow on hit and deal more damage to slowed enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)
effects: +100% Chance to apply Slow on Hit

contempt.name: Contempt
contempt.description: 10% more armor and +10% to all resistances

corrupted_heraldry.name: Corrupted Heraldry
corrupted_heraldry.description:
5% increased movement speed and mana regen

+5 Spell Void Damage

crimson_shroud.name: Crimson Shroud
crimson_shroud.description: Additional bleed chance and less damage taken over time
effects: +50% Chance to apply Bleed on Hit

critical_effluence.name: Critical Effluence
critical_effluence.description: Increases Critical Strike Chance with Spells

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description: Massively Increases damage and reduces damage taken while in Darkness

divine_essence.name: Divine Essence
divine_essence.description: Increases Healing and Armor, and reduces damage over time taken

dusk_shroud.name: Dusk Shroud
dusk_shroud.description: Adds Glancing Blow chance and Dodge Rating
effects: 5% Chance to receive a Glancing Blow when hit

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.description: Increases attack, cast and move speed

mirage_form.name: Mirage Form
mirage_form.description: Increased bleed chance and dodge rating

molten_infusion.name: Molten Infusion
molten_infusion.description: Added melee fire damage and ignite chance
effects: +30% Chance to apply Ignite on Hit

revolution.name: Revolution
revolution.description: Grants 13% increased cast speed and added spell damage based on 20% of the caster's maximum mana

runeword_avalanche.name: Runeword Avalanche
runeword_avalanche.description:
+10 Spell Cold Damage
+2 Endurance Threshold per Ignite on the Attacker
effects: +2 Endurance Threshold per stack of Ignite on the Attacker

runeword_cataclysm.name: Runeword Cataclysm
runeword_cataclysm.description: Deal more damage to low health enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)
effects: 15% more Damage to Low Health Enemies

runeword_hurricane.name: Runeword Hurricane
runeword_hurricane.description:
+10 Spell Lightning Damage
+90% Freeze Rate Multiplier

runeword_inferno.name: Runeword Inferno
runeword_inferno.description:
+10 Spell Fire Damage
+3% More Armor Per Shock On Enemy
effects: 3% more Armor per stack of Shock on the Attackermultiplicative with other modifiers

sciurine_rage.name: Sciurine Rage
sciurine_rage.description: 40% increased movement and melee attack speed

shrine_haste.name: Shrine Haste
shrine_haste.description: Increases movement speed, attack speed, and cast speed

silver_shroud.name: Silver Shroud
silver_shroud.description: Dodge your next hit and gain ward per stack

spirit_kindling.name: Spirit Kindling
spirit_kindling.description: Drains 1% of current health every second, but grants 12% increased movement speed, 5% increased melee attack speed, and ignite chance equal to 30% of caster's ignite chance
effects: 2% of Current Health Drained per Second

storm_infusion.name: Storm Infusion
storm_infusion.description: Added Lightning Damage from Storm Totem

stunning_shrine.name: Stunning Shrine
stunning_shrine.description: 200% increased stun chance and stun duration

talon_blades.name: Talon Blades
talon_blades.description: Increases crit chance and crit multiplier

void_essence.name: Void Essence
void_essence.description: Grants more void damage and more melee damage, and reduces received stun duration

water_shrine.name: Water Shrine
water_shrine.description: 100% increased mana regen and cooldown recovery speed

aberroth_s_time_rot.name: Aberroth's Time Rot
aberroth_s_time_rot.description: Deals void damage and shreds void resistance

acid_skin.name: Acid Skin
acid_skin.description: A Curse that deals poison damage over time and increases the chance to be crit by 20%.
effects: +20% Chance to Receive a Critical Strike

anguish.name: Anguish
anguish.description: A Curse that causes the target to deal less damage over time and deals necrotic damage to all enemies afflicted with it whenever you kill an enemy.

arcane_mark.name: Arcane Mark
arcane_mark.description: Grants a chance to poison on hit and increases damage over time
